name: Pirate's Mast
description:
Created for Jamcraft 3.

A Pirate goes to an adventure to get a Mast for his Ship.

Credits:

  • Free Sounds/Musics from: https://freesound.org/ and from https://soundcloud.com/
  • ATEX asset from Gamemaker's marketplace
  • Made by: Flafy

KEYS:

  • move: arrows
  • jump: ALT
  • attack: CTRL
  • talk/pick items: Z
  • skip text: X
  • portal: up arrow
  • full screen: ALT + ENTER

(I know ingame it says "attak" and not "attack" LMAO)
